name: Peep The Horror
description:
I know 3 things about Jerma. He's the among us sus guy, he doesn't like being called the among us sus guy, and the fan animation "Peep The Horror".  As every god loving American knows its good to pretend shit you don't know so I made a entire fan game about a streamer(youtuber) I know nothing about.

I'll be making more of these projects in the future at my channel Failfer.

Literally all the songs were made by a cool dude called KrispKitwho casually walked up, was dope, made an entire soundtrack for the game,  proceeds to elaborate. Check them out here

Thank you for the support :)
